stories.text:
Hello,
I'm trying to get a better understanding of web3 (other than reading LinkedIn posts and comments on HN)
What would be the best sources to learn from  ? (article, books, interview, conference, podcast...)
stories.title: Ask HN: Best Source(s) on Web3
The 2017 blogpost that explains unrest in Xinjiang, Kazachstan, and Belarus
I Cannot Begin to Tell You How Proficient I Am in Microsoft Word
No-nonsense server architecture for group based SaaS

stories.text:
Hello, I was just reading an article on an italian newspapers about American football clubs owners using AI for their clubs in Italy, unsuccessfully, and I was wondering if you have example of AI working,

The article starts outside clubs with the example of Euro2020 final, where the penalty takers were calculated by an AI, and 3 of them failed their shot

Then there is like Parma that went from serie D to A in 3 years but now since it has been bought by AI-using ameericans is on the bottom of Serie B, then Genoa that was bought by these AI-using americans and got DS and 4 couch in a season one one which got 9 loss in 9 matches, and Tiago Pinto and Rome who are worse this year than last, but yeah seems like AI doesn't do sport well.. or do you have examples that proves its effectiveness?
stories.title: Ask HN: Does AI works for sports? Do you have examples?
‘The Greens want to take our meat away’: Europeans go to war over their dinner
